suroiApiKey.description: API key for the Suroi API.

youtubeDownloaderPath.description: Path to the yt-dlp executable used to download YouTube videos for the /song command.

mainGuildId.description: The ID of the main Discord guild the bot is installed to.

policeGuildId.description: The ID of the game modding Discord guild the bot is installed to.

moderationLogChannelId.description: The ID of the channel to send moderation logs to.

levelingChannelId.description: The ID of the channel to send leveling up messages in.

countingChannelId.description: The ID of the channel for the counting activity.

gameModLogChannelId.description: The ID of the channel in the police server to send punishment logs to.

gameModRoles.description: Roles that are allowed to perform game mod actions.
